name: 梁文耀
objective: 本課程從實務的角度介紹嵌入式系統各個層面的設計方式。內容包含：嵌入式系統概觀、ARM 架構與指令集、即時系統、嵌入式應用程式開發、Android、多核心系統、多執行緒、ARM組語言與C語言之關係、系統啟動流程、Linux核心與驅動程式介紹。課程大綱請參考課程進度。
schedule:
Embedded Systems Overview (W1)
ARM SoC Architecture (W2)
Real-time Systems (W3-4)
Embedded Application Development with Android as a Case Study (W5-8)
Multi-core Embedded Systems and Multi-thread Programming (W9-10)
ARM Assembly and C Language  (W11)
Booting Embedded Systems (W12)
Device Drivers and the OS Kernel (W13-15)
Low Power Embedded System Design (W16)
Term Project Demo (W17-18)
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quiz (50%)
Term Project (total 50%)
- Term Project Proposal (5%)
- Term Project Status Report (5%)
- Term Project + Report (40%)
